current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Authorizing the reporting of committee
		  funding resolutions for the period October 1, 2013, through February 28,
		  2015.

committee-name.#tail: , reported the following original resolution; which was placed on the calendar

text.#text:
That notwithstanding paragraph 9 of
			 rule XXVI of the Standing Rules of the Senate—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to
			 defray its expenses, including the compensation of members of its staff, for
			 the period October 1, 2013, through February 28, 2015; and

text.#text:
not later than
			 September 20, 2013, each committee shall report 1 resolution authorizing the
			 committee to make expenditures out of the contingent fund of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may report 1 authorization resolution containing more
			 than 1 committee authorization resolution for the period October 1, 2013,
			 through February 28, 2015.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SRES 228 ATS: Authorizing the reporting of committee funding resolutions for the period October 1, 2013, through February 28, 2015.
